thread.title: Celebrities who lived in trailer parks before they made it big (11 Photos)
thread.title_full: Celebrities who lived in trailer parks before they made it big (11 Photos)

author: Chase
title: Celebrities who lived in trailer parks before they made it big (11 Photos)
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Drew Carey moved from Cleveland to Los Angeles to try to get onto The Tonight Show Starring Johnny Carson , and for 18 months he lived out of his car before he got on the show. He eventually booked a spot with Johnny and was so good that he earned a place on Carson’s couch after his set. 2 
Demi Moore was raised in a trailer park in New Mexico by her alcoholic mother and abusive stepfather. She eventually started to pursue modeling at the age of 16 and dropped out of school–her career took off soon after. 3 
Ryan Gosling was a member of Mickey Mouse Club as a kid, but despite the role he and his mom had to live in a trailer park because of his parents’ divorce which saw him making a living for both he and his mother. “Most of the other Mickey Mouse Club members went to this apartment complex [in Florida], but it was too expensive for my mother and me, so we lived in this trailer park.” 4 
Before Kelly Clarkson won the first season of American Idol , her apartment in Los Angeles was lost in a fire and she was forced to live out of her car and shower at the gym. 5 
Before Tyler Perry made it big he lived out of his car in Atlanta while trying to get noticed as a playwright. He was homeless off and on for a couple years in the ’90s until his play I Know I’ve Been Changed earned him fame and success. Advertisement Advertisement 6 
Jim Carrey and his family moved into a van when he was 12 after his father lost his job. Carrey describes this time period as traumatic and it no doubt fueled his dedication that launched his career. 7 
Before Britney Spears became a pop icon she stayed in her aunt’s trailer to get away from her parents who had marital issues. 8 
William Shatner divorced his wife after Star Trek went off the air in 1969 and started living in his truck due to a lack of available work. 9 
After Danny Bonaduce’s role as the funny son on The Partridge Family he got into drugs and became homeless. He moved out of his house at the age of 15 and lived in his car which he parked behind Grauman’s Chinese Theater in Hollywood so he could sign autographs for his fans during the day. 10 
Hilary Swank grew up in a trailer park and even lived in her car while she was trying to find work as an actress. Advertisement Advertisement 11 
Eminem’s poor upbringing is well documented in music and movie form. He, his mother, and brother lived in a trailer park in Detroit until he made it big when he was 23. 
Related Video: Hero train driver warns passengers before collision with truck 12
